Container.Name: tasui
Container.Overview: TasUI is a zero-install device management interface web application for all your Tasmota devices. It will discover your deployed devices and allow you to set up and configure every device from a single dashboard. This initial version includes multiple views (Control, Health, Firmware, Wi-Fi, & MQTT) to allow you to quickly assess the state of your devices. There is also a detailed view (e.g., SetOptions, Status, etc.) available.
